programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks Italy
programme.sub-title: Italian Alps Comfort Food
programme.desc: Jamie is high up in the Italian Alps cooking some great comfort food, including dumplings, mind-blowing macaroni cheese, and a classic red wine and sausage risotto.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks Italy
programme.sub-title: Masterclass In Sicilian Sweets
programme.desc: Jamie gets a masterclass in Sicilian sweets and cooking up an epic tuna, prawn and pistachio spaghetti. There's also some chocolaty cannoli.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks Italy
programme.sub-title: Tuscan Farmhouse Classics
programme.desc: Jamie is taking spaghetti bolognese to the next level and re-creating a mind-blowing Jewish-Italian recipe. There's also beef stew with pappardelle.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks Italy
programme.sub-title: Fast Paced Roman Recipes
programme.desc: Jamie tracks down some fast, fresh and easy recipes, featuring tasty minty pea tortiglioni and gnocchi with roasted tomato sauce and rocket pesto.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks Italy
programme.sub-title: Italian Alps Comfort Food
programme.desc: Jamie is high up in the Italian Alps cooking some great comfort food, including dumplings, mind-blowing macaroni cheese, and a classic red wine and sausage risotto.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.sub-title: World of Burgers!
programme.desc: It's burger day! Chef Dale tackles three classics with a full flavor spin. Game changing Pho Burgers with bone marrow, toasted milk bread Ahi Tuna patty melts, and Chori Pan Burgers with a fried egg and shrimp chips.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.sub-title: The Perfection of Pork
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings the heat when it comes to making perfect pork dishes including a root beer glazed pork banh mi, chorizo fried rice, Filipino sausage stuffed long hot peppers, and round it all out with a spicy grilled pineapple sundae.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.sub-title: Ribs Remix
programme.desc: Ribs are a lifestyle, and Chef Dale's living it up with smoky beef shorties in tangy red wine glaze, Miami-style pork ribs dripping in bacon-guava BBQ, spicy baked beans, and killer key lime caramel cones. Grab some napkins!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.sub-title: Bussin' Burgers
programme.desc: Chef Dale is flipping burgers into art - gooey mac & cheese burgers, fancy French patties topped with melty bucheron cheese, crispy parm-truffle fries, and peanut butter fudge ice cream sandwiches. Get hungry.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks Italy
programme.sub-title: Best of Salina's Land and Sea
programme.desc: Jamie returns to cooking the food he loves the most, getting right to heart of the Italian kitchen.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks Italy
programme.sub-title: Hand-Crafted Pasta in Puglia
programme.desc: Jamie heads for one of the hottest food destinations in Italy, making hand-crafted pasta, a special seafood stew, and the region's answer to paella.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks Italy
programme.sub-title: Making Pizza in Naples
programme.desc: Jamie visits the pizza capital of Italy to learn recipes from the locals and tries acquapazza, fish poached in crazy water.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Back to Our Caveman Roots
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern goes primal with two antelope dishes: a Greek-style whole leg roasted over the open fire with a lemony avgolemono sauce and crispy potatoes, and a simple antelope tenderloin carpaccio served with roasted tomatoes and parmesan.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Chicken Fried Deer and Creole Halibut
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern prepares chicken fried axis deer. Next, Chef Zimmern poaches halibut in tomato roux.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Bison Tomahawk Chop with Italian-style Eggplant and Panzanella
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern shares a simple trick for getting the most out Bison tomahawk chops.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Braised Pigeon with Homemade Herb Gnocchi
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern cooks braised squab with olives and vinegar, a perfect meal for a fall evening.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Grilled Squid Salad and Crispy Squid on the Plancha
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern creates a vibrant salad where grilled squid is served with shaved fennel, cherry tomatoes, endive, and a lemon dressing. Then, Andrew shares his country-style squid on the plancha with fresh breadcrumbs, chilies, and a homemade aioli.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Poultry Perfection: Moroccan Spiced Guinea Hen with Charred Vegetables
programme.desc: Andrew unlocks the rich flavor of guinea hen with a vibrant grilled salad featuring watercress and a mustard-hazelnut vinaigrette. Then, he slow-roasts a whole bird with Middle Eastern spices, served with harissa squash and eggplant-tahini purée.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Venison Paillard and Hearty Hunter's Stew
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern showcases venison two ways: a delicate grilled paillard with artichokes and parmesan, and a rich, slow-braised Polish hunter's stew with kielbasa, mushrooms, and sauerkraut. Served with grilled leeks and coal-roasted potatoes.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Mediterranean Grilled Filets and Salt Crusted Halibut
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern elevates California halibut, first with grilled fillets on saffron labneh with romesco and roasted cabbage. Then, he demonstrates a classic salt-crusted whole halibut, served with whole roasted cauliflower and a rich cream sauce.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: The King of Open-Fire Paella
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern showcases quail two ways: classic Southern fried quail with lemon-basil aioli, and as an elevated topping for a traditional open-fire paella, complete with crispy socarrat. He proves this small bird makes an extraordinary dinner.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Minnesota's Foraged Mushroom Feast
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern explores Minnesota's forests for wild mushrooms. He creates a simple grilled mushroom salad, then hand-shapes cavatelli pasta tossed with golden chanterelles, butter, garlic, thyme, and colatura. He shares foraging and cleaning tips.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Grilled Clams Casino and Garlicky Clam Pizza
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern celebrates cherrystone clams with two show-stopping recipes. He prepares classic grilled clams casino with pancetta, then pushes boundaries with an innovative grilled pizza topped with clams, garlic, chiles, and cheese.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Elk Tenderloin Tostadas and Grilled Rack of Ribs
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern highlights lean elk, first crafting classic Mexican tostadas with grilled tenderloin, avocado, and homemade salsa macha. Then, he grills a whole rack of elk, serving it with creamy colcannon, tarragon emulsion, and rosemary charcoal.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Southern Shrimp Skewers and Asian Crispy Rice
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern grills beloved shrimp in two distinct ways. He starts with jumbo shrimp and country ham skewers glazed with sweet-hot pepper jelly. Then, he creates Asian-inspired shrimp, served over crispy battle rice and a complex sambal.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Wild Boar Feast: Chorizo with Mussels and Whole Roasted Leg
programme.desc: Wild boar takes center stage! Andrew makes chorizo with mussels, preserved lemon & white wine. Then, he slow-roasts a whole leg over fire, served Southern-style with pickled cherries, glazed onions & mustard sauce.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: The Legend of Louis Mueller's Dino Beef Ribs
programme.desc: Pat visits his close friend Wayne Mueller, third-generation pitmaster of Louis Mueller's BBQ, to learn the ins and outs of his famous dino beef ribs.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: Searching for Oaxaca in Tennessee
programme.desc: Pat visits Edgar Victoria, known for bringing the street foods of Mexico City to Nashville, to do some live fire cooking out in nature as they prepare one of his favorite dishes - skirt steak tlayuda.

programme.title: Hardcore Carnivore
programme.sub-title: Whole Hog BBQ with Pitmaster Pat Martin
programme.desc: Jess teams up with legendary West Tennessee pitmaster and whole hog expert Pat Martin to cook a hog overnight and enjoy a special cut of beef from Australia.

programme.title: Hardcore Carnivore
programme.sub-title: Texas A&M Meat Science Experiment
programme.desc: In windy Canyon, Texas, Jess visits West Texas A&M, where she interacts with a cloned cow, participates in a blind meat tasting experiment, and helps teach us how to break down a carcass into the cuts we see in the grocery store.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Seasons
programme.sub-title: Crispy Pork Noodles and Cheesy Chard Cannelloni
programme.desc: Jamie celebrates rhubarb in a lip-smacking sauce, heroes spinach in a silky goat's cheese risotto and marries vibrant basil with chard in a crowd-pleasing cheesy spring cannelloni.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Seasons
programme.sub-title: Spring Onion Chicken Curry and Sausage Broccoli Pizza
programme.desc: Jamie elevates asparagus spears for a fishy feat, makes spring onions the star of the show in his spicy green chicken curry and gives purple sprouting broccoli an Italian-inspired makeover.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Seasons
programme.sub-title: Stuffed Salmon Celebration and Almond Custard Tart
programme.desc: Jamie snazzes up some spuds with wild garlic pesto, creates a broad bean mezze, rustles up a beautiful spring salad and honours rhubarb in a luscious custard tart with almond brittle.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Seasons
programme.sub-title: Summer-y Sweet Pea Risotto and Slow Roasted Pork
programme.desc: Jamie celebrates summer with roasted fennel pork & gratin, oozy pea risotto, and rainbow slaw chicken wraps. He shares edible hanging basket tips. The feast finishes with stunning mackerel on sun-dried tomato couscous with colorful beets.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Seasons
programme.sub-title: Buddy's Strawberry Rice Pudding and Summer Tomato Chicken Bake
programme.desc: Jamie cooks a chicken sheet pan dinner with early tomatoes, potatoes and chorizo. Buddy helps pick strawberries for quick jam rice pudding. The summer feast ends with spicy shrimp skewers with homegrown chillies and a refreshing cucumber gazpacho.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Seasons
programme.sub-title: Endless Summer: From Grilled Panzanella Salad to Sour Cherry Tart
programme.desc: Jamie ends summer with crispy duck in a rich plum sauce & roast potatoes. Grilled peppers star in panzanella. Garden zucchini become Mediterranean rice. Sweet finale: sour cherry frangipane with crème fraîche.
